content:
Posting the video as a regular post will give it more visibility and help you achieve your goal of increasing engagement and attracting new followers.

Adding a call-to-action (CTA) in the caption is an excellent idea! CTAs can encourage engagement, increase interaction, and even drive user-generated content. Here are a few options you could consider:

1. **Ask followers to share their own pet videos**: "Share your own funny pet moments in the comments below!"
2. **Tag a friend who loves cats**: "Tag a cat lover who needs a daily dose of adorable in their life!"
3. **Ask followers to share their favorite cat breeds or toys**: "What's your favorite cat breed? Let us know in the comments!"
4. **Encourage followers to use a branded hashtag**: "Use #LunaLovesYarn and share your own yarn-tastic moments with us!"

Remember to keep your CTA clear, concise, and relevant to the content. You can also use emojis to make it more attention-grabbing and fun.

By adding a CTA, you'll not only increase engagement but also create a sense of community and encourage user-generated content. This can help drive more traffic to your account and attract new followers.

One more tip: make sure to respond to comments and engage with your followers who participate in the CTA. This will show that you value their input and care about their feedback, which can help build a loyal community around your account.
